about_the_game:
In Void Vanguard, you’ll journey to exotic, perilous planets overrun with hostile alien forces. Your mission: eliminate the threat on each planet, gather advanced technology, and upgrade your arsenal to survive increasingly dangerous challenges.

Void Vanguard is a sci-fi action shooter with rogue-like elements and intense planetary exploration. Each planet offers a unique environment—from blistering deserts and frigid tundras to dense jungles—presenting diverse ecosystems and alien creatures that test your strategy and skill.

Features:

  • Planetary Exploration: Experience a variety of worlds, each with different climates and biomes. Every environment requires you to adapt to survive, with new challenges awaiting on each planet.

  • Intense Alien Combat: Face a range of enemies with unique attack patterns and weaknesses. You’ll encounter swarming insects, massive armored beasts, and cunning predators—each demanding different tactics. Here, survival is more than shooting; you’ll need to read enemy movements, plan your attacks, and make the most of your upgrades.

  • Randomized Upgrades: With each level up, you’ll be offered three random upgrade choices—boosted firepower, faster fire rate, enhanced armors, special abilities, and much more. These upgrades let you experiment freely, making each round dynamic and offering a fresh take on combat.

  • Advanced Weaponry and Customization: Gather resources across planets to upgrade your weapons and gear. Each weapon can be upgraded, allowing you to develop a unique fighting style.

  • Progression-Based Skills: Survive on more planets to earn experience points that unlock specialized abilities. Build skills that boost your endurance, increase agility, or improve precision, and become a formidable space warrior over time.

  • Epic Boss Battles: On each planet, you’ll face powerful alien bosses tailored to the planet’s terrain and environment. These bosses possess special abilities, pushing your skills and tactical choices to the limit. Each encounter presents a unique challenge that requires precision, patience, and the right upgrades to conquer.

Explore the galaxy’s most hostile reaches in Void Vanguard, upgrade your weapons, and face alien forces never seen before.
